summary: Fix for Grey Ledge Manor windows.
descriptionHtml:
If you are using the unofficial Skyrim patches, you will have noticed that the windows of Grey Ledge Manor are opaque, I fix that with this mod.

Installation: Install using Nexus Mod Manager or extract the archive to the data folder. If you are asked to overwrite (you won't be but if so), do so. Doesn't matter in what order you install them, Grey Ledge Manor or the fix, either is fine.

There is no plugin or anything to worry about.

Requirements: Only [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18112/?]Grey Ledge Manor - No Load Doors by Wreznor[/url], don't forget to endorse his mod which is a house mod that I highly recommend. There are no load screen doors, it's an awesome exterior worldspace home, with a great view.

For admin: although I've altered nothing in the original mod itself, just in case, here is my [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/691444-grey-ledge-manor-no-load-doors/?p=7687970]Permission

[/url]
author: Doesntcareaboutname wreznor
